content: resist fascism @amydrucker knit hat pattern materials +/- 175 yards worsted weight yarn and your choice of needles to knit in the round i used malabrigio rios and us7 32 circular with the magic loop method gauge 18sts per 4 finished size one size fits most adults 22 circumference stretched 1 cast on 96 sts using your favorite stretchy method 2 join taking care not to twist to work in the round and mark beginning of round 3 work *k1 p1* ribbing until ribbing measures 5 for a folded brim 2 5 folded or until 2 5 if you prefer no fold 4 switch to stockinette in the round knit all sts until the hat measures 5 5 from edge or fold in brim 5 set up decreases as follows k24 pm k48 pm k24 6 you will decrease every row now to create the pointed top as follows k to 4 sts before 1st marker k2tog k2 sm k2 ssk k to 4 sts before 2nd marker k2tog k2 sm k2 ssk k to end 7 repeat decrease row until there are 3 sts left on either side of the 2 markers 8 cut yarn and using a darning needle pull through the remaining 6 sts finishing tassel cut 9 pieces of yarn 22 long at the outside top of hat pull each strand through so that each end of each piece is on either side of the top of the hat divide the 18 resources strands into 3 groups of 6 strands and braid until 2 5 section coming remain knot all strands together and trim fringe soon weave in ends @amydrucker wear and fight fascism while keeping warm
